prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an imposing tall alien man, VIBRANT emerald green skin texture, black cape and white turban, intense focused eyes, muscular physique
feature_prompt: detailed skin surface imperfections, subtle wet sheen on the skin, realistic fabric texture on turban and cape
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, plastic, smooth green skin, cell shaded, dark silhouette, black skin, low quality, cartoon eyes
